p: The data analysis was performed using SAS Enterprise version 9.2 (SAS Institute, Cary, NC, USA) and the HIRA database system via remote access. The statistical analysis was performed using SPSS version 18.0 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). The mean age and mean values in medical records were estimated using the t-test. We used a Pearson correlation analysis to determine the correlations of febrile seizure with viral infection. A two-tailed P value of <0.05 was considered significant.
